application.offer

Class Offer

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.offer.Offer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HolidayOffer, LivingOffer

    public abstract class Offer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class stores the basic data needed for an Offer. It is abstract, as it is used to create HolidayOffer and LivingOffer
    Author:
    Miguel Arconada (miguel.arconada@estudiante.uam.es) y Alberto Gonzalez (alberto.gonzalezk@estudiante.uam.es)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Parameters:
        startingDate - Starting date of the offer
        price - Price of the offer
        deposit - Deposit to be paid for the offer
        description - Description of the offer
        offeredHouse - House in which the offer takes place

      • modifyOffer

        public void modifyOffer(java.time.LocalDate startingDate)
                 throws InvalidOfferStatusException,
                        NotTheOwnerException
        Method used to modify the starting date of the offer
        Parameters:
        startingDate - New starting date of the offer
        Throws:
        NotTheOwnerException - When the user trying to modify the offer is not the owner of the house
        InvalidOfferStatusException - When you try to modify a offer that is not pending for changes

      • modifyOffer

        public void modifyOffer(java.lang.Double price,
                        java.lang.Double deposit)
                 throws InvalidOfferStatusException,
                        NotTheOwnerException
        Method used to modify the price and deposit of the offer
        Parameters:
        price - New price of the offer
        deposit - New deposit of the offer
        Throws:
        NotTheOwnerException - When the user trying to modify the offer is not the owner of the house
        InvalidOfferStatusException - When you try to modify a offer that is not pending for changes

                        NotTheOwnerException

        description - New description of the offer
        Throws:
        NotTheOwnerException - When the user trying to modify the offer is not the owner of the house

      • payOffer

        public void payOffer()
              throws NoUserLoggedException,
                     CouldNotPayHostException,
                     es.uam.eps.padsof.telecard.InvalidCardNumberException
        Method used to pay for an offer
        Throws:
        NoUserLoggedException - When no user is logged in the app
        CouldNotPayHostException - When the system could not pay the host
        es.uam.eps.padsof.telecard.InvalidCardNumberException - When the card number of the guest is not 16 digits long

      • payHost

        public abstract void payHost()
                      throws CouldNotPayHostException
        Method used to pay the host what has been paid by the client minus the system fees
        Throws:
        CouldNotPayHostException - When the app could not pay the host (invalid card number)

      • rateOffer

        public void rateOffer(java.lang.String opinion)
               throws NoUserLoggedException
        Method used to add an opinion about the offer
        Parameters:
        opinion - Comment about the offer
        Throws:
        NoUserLoggedException - When a non-logged user tries to comment an offer

        public abstract OfferType getType()
        Method that returns the type of the offer. It is abstract as an Offer has no type unless it is from a subclass
